options.text: Select the name of the series you want to create this entry for and link to the post on social media. Instgram for Data4Good Monday and Datenschutz Donnerstag. Youtube for the Video Content. If you selected Video Content under kind, the link is used to embed the video on the website. Text is only used for Datenschutz Donnerstag.

meta.note: An internal project is a project where we do not collaborate with an external organization, e.g. R package development projects.
The project ID is composed by the (expected) date of the start of the project (yyyy-mm)  and a three letter uppercase identifier (usually for the NPO).
meta.validation_message: The project ID is composed by the (expected) date of the start of the project (yyyy-mm)  and a three letter uppercase identifier (usually for the NPO).

meta.note: Where in the process is the project?
The Slack channel where the team is coming together
The day of the kickoff event or first meeting/asynchronous interaction (e.g. via Slack) between the selected team and the partner organization.

options.placeholder: The legal form of the association we are working with

meta.note: Three letter uppercase short id, e.g. COR for CorrelAid e.V. or DRK for Deutsches Rotes Kreuz.
meta.validation_message: The short id must be three uppercase letters.

meta.note: Sometimes, organizations have a dedicated English website. Otherwise, just enter the German twice.
short description of the output, e.g. for a link display
For relative links, write the url like this: /projekte_beratung/projekte
Youtube Videos, embedded as IFrame, are not visible in WYSIWYG (they show up as blank area) but you can see and edit thim in the raw view.
